mapper.insert: insert into CHANGERECORDINFO ( REFSERIALNO, TABLENAME, CUSTNO, APKIND, RECORDBEFORE, RECORDAFTER ) values ( #{refserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordbefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordafter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into fdacfinalresult ( SERIALNO, CUSTNO, TRADEACCOID, BANKSERIALID, APKIND,
WORKDATE, APDT, APTM, STATUS) values ( #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeaccoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankserialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aptm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') apdt, date_format(now(),'%H%I%S') aptm, date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') workdate
